          <title>
            <string language="en">Bromination of ethene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bromierung von ethene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bromation d'ethene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bromination do ethene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bromurazione di ethene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Bromination του ethene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bromination del ethene</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the reaction mechanism of the addition of bromine to ethene. A carbocation is formed as an intermediate.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbocation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electron-rich centre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrophile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ethene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanism</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Reaktion Einheit der 
Hinzufügung des Broms zum ethene. Ein carbocation wird als 
Vermittler gebildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le mécanisme de 
réaction de l'ajout du brome à l'ethene. Un carbocation est 
formé comme intermédiaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o mecanismo da reação da
adição do bromo ao ethene. Um carbocation é dado forma como 
um intermediário.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il meccanismo di 
reazione dell'aggiunta del bromo a ethene. Un carbocation è 
formato come intermediario.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μηχανισμό αντίδρασης της 
προσθήκης του βρωμίου στο ethene. Ένα carbocation 
διαμορφώνεται ως μεσάζων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el mecanismo de la 
reacción de la adición del bromo al ethene. Un carbocation se 
forma como intermedio.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
